Rearrange restricted existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2010.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.) 

---

 Rearrange existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2010.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 30-May-2011.)
statement:
reean.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
reean.2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
reean $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( E. x e. A ph /\ E. y e. B ps ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x $.
$d x y $.
